sn48.19:1.1: Atha kho annataro bhikkhu yena bhagava tenupasankami; upasankamitva bhagavantam abhivadetva ekamantam nisidi. Ekamantam nisinno kho so bhikkhu bhagavantam etadavoca:
sn48.19:2.2: Kittavata nu kho, bhante, indriyasampanno hoti”ti?
sn48.19:2.3: “Idha, bhikkhu, bhikkhu saddhindriyam bhaveti upasamagamim sambodhagamim, viriyindriyam bhaveti upasamagamim sambodhagamim, satindriyam bhaveti upasamagamim sambodhagamim, samadhindriyam bhaveti upasamagamim sambodhagamim, pannindriyam bhaveti upasamagamim sambodhagamim.
sn48.19:2.4: Ettavata kho, bhikkhu, bhikkhu indriyasampanno hoti”ti.
